name: hotel-reception-app
description: Hotel Reception Management System - Complete walk-in booking solution

scripts.dev: npm run dev:db && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.seed: docker compose exec hotel-backend npm run prisma:seed
scripts.migrate: docker compose exec hotel-backend npm run prisma:deploy
scripts.studio: docker compose exec hotel-backend npm run prisma:studio

author: Hotel Reception System
